title: William IV of Provence
text: William IV (died 1030) was the <a href="Count%20of%20Provence">Count of Provence</a> from 1018 to his death. He was a son of <a href="William%20II%20of%20Provence">William II</a>, whom he succeeded, and a co-count with his brothers <a href="Fulk%20Bertrand%20of%20Provence">Fulk</a> and <a href="Geoffrey%20I%20of%20Provence">Geoffrey</a>. He appears in many charters of his mother, Gerberga, who acted as his regent until 1019. He was the eldest amongst his siblings and he seems to have been the first to carry the title of "comes".
